name: Shroom (itch) (Dr.Charlous, NaoYu, Antoine Foucault)
description:
Description :

This is the story of a tiny shroom who  has to venture outside of his habitat after it got ravaged by a fire. It will have to fend for himself and find a new home, a  new paradise for mushroom. To do this you'll have to take the  control of bodies around you.

Credits :

Game Designer : Romain Horrenberger, Léa-Maria Ambrosio, Erwan Sevestre, Rafael Bauchiere.

Game Artist : Adam Lenglen, Mahiedine Boudrissa, Naomie Halter.

Game Programmer : Antoine Foucault, Charles Piercourt

Musics : Louis Gaubil

Submitted for the 2023 Global Game Jam  whose theme was Roots.
